verses.verse: Let us <WG5399> therefore <WG3767> fear <WG5399> <WG5680>, lest <WG3379>, a promise <WG1860> being left <WG2641> <WG5746> us of entering <WG1525> <WG5629> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, any <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> should seem <WG1380> <WG5725> to come short of it <WG5302> <WG5760>.

For <WG2532> <WG1063> unto us was <WG2070> <WG5748> the gospel preached <WG2097> <WG5772>, as well as <WG2509> unto them <WG2548>: but <WG235> the word <WG3056> preached <WG189> did <WG5623> not <WG3756> profit <WG5623> <WG5656> them <WG1565>, not <WG3361> being mixed <WG4786> <WG5772> with faith <WG4102> in them that heard <WG191> <WG5660> it.

For <WG1063> we which <WG3588> have believed <WG4100> <WG5660> do enter <WG1525> <WG5736> into <WG1519> rest <WG2663>, as <WG2531> he said <WG2046> <WG5758>, As <WG5613> I have sworn <WG3660> <WG5656> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> wrath <WG3709>, if <WG1487> they shall enter <WG1525> <WG5695> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> rest <WG2663>: although <WG2543> the works <WG2041> were finished <WG1096> <WG5679> from <WG575> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>.

For <WG1063> he spake <WG2046> <WG5758> in a certain place <WG4225> of <WG4012> the seventh <WG1442> day on this wise <WG3779>, And <WG2532> 'Elohim <WG2316> did rest <WG2664> <WG5656> the seventh <WG1722> <WG1442> day <WG2250> from <WG575> all <WG3956> his <WG846> works <WG2041>.
And <WG2532> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> place again <WG3825>, If <WG1487> they shall enter <WG1525> <WG5695> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> rest <WG2663>.

Seeing <WG1893> therefore <WG3767> it remaineth <WG620> <WG5743> that some <WG5100> must enter <WG1525> <WG5629> therein <WG1519> <WG846>, and <WG2532> they to whom it was first <WG4386> preached <WG2097> <WG5685> entered <WG1525> not <WG3756> in <WG1525> <WG5627> because <WG1223> of unbelief <WG543>:

Again <WG3825>, he limiteth <WG3724> <WG5719> a certain <WG5100> day <WG2250>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723> in <WG1722> David <WG1138>, To day <WG4594>, after <WG3326> so long <WG5118> a time <WG5550>; as <WG2531> it is said <WG2046> <WG5769>, To day <WG4594> if <WG1437> ye will hear <WG191> <WG5661> his <WG846> voice <WG5456>, harden <WG4645> <WG5725> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had given <WG2664> them <WG846> rest <WG2664> <WG5656>, then would he <WG302> not <WG3756> afterward <WG3326> <WG5023> have spoken <WG2980> <WG5707> of <WG4012> another <WG243> day <WG2250>.
There remaineth <WG620> <WG5743> therefore <WG686> a rest <WG4520> to the people <WG2992> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> he that is entered <WG1525> <WG5631> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, he <WG846> also <WG2532> hath ceased <WG2664> <WG5656> from <WG575> his own <WG846> works <WG2041>, as <WG5618> 'Elohim <WG2316> did from <WG575> his <WG2398>.

Let us labour <WG4704> <WG5661> therefore <WG3767> to enter <WG1525> <WG5629> into <WG1519> that <WG1565> rest <WG2663>, lest <WG3363> any man <WG5100> fall <WG4098> <WG5632> after <WG1722> the same <WG846> example <WG5262> of unbelief <WG543>.

For <WG1063> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316> is quick <WG2198> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> powerful <WG1756>, and <WG2532> sharper <WG5114> than <WG5228> any <WG3956> twoedged <WG1366> sword <WG3162>, piercing <WG1338> <WG5740> even to <WG891> the dividing asunder <WG3311> of soul <WG5590> and <WG5037> <WG2532> spirit <WG4151>, and <WG5037> <WG2532> of the joints <WG719> and <WG2532> marrow <WG3452>, and <WG2532> is a discerner <WG2924> of the thoughts <WG1761> and <WG2532> intents <WG1771> of the heart <WG2588>.

Neither <WG2532> <WG3756> is there <WG2076> <WG5748> any creature <WG2937> that is not manifest <WG852> in his <WG846> sight <WG1799>: but <WG1161> all things <WG3956> are naked <WG1131> and <WG2532> opened <WG5136> <WG5772> unto the eyes <WG3788> of him <WG846> with <WG4314> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2254> to do <WG3056>.

Seeing <WG2192> then <WG3767> that we have <WG2192> <WG5723> a great <WG3173> Kohen HaGodol <WG749>, that is passed into <WG1330> <WG5756> the heavens <WG3772>, Yeshuw`a <WG2424> the Son <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, let us hold fast <WG2902> <WG5725> our profession <WG3671>.

For <WG1063> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> not <WG3756> an Kohen HaGodol <WG749> which cannot <WG3361> <WG1410> <WG5740> be touched with the feeling <WG4834> <WG5658> of our <WG2257> infirmities <WG769>; but <WG1161> was <WG3985> in <WG2596> all points <WG3956> tempted <WG3985> <WG5772> <WG5625> <WG3987> <WG5772> like <WG2596> as <WG3665> we are, yet without <WG5565> sin <WG266>.

Let us <WG4334> therefore <WG3767> come <WG4334> <WG5741> boldly <WG3326> <WG3954> unto the throne <WG2362> of grace <WG5485>, that <WG2443> we may obtain <WG2983> <WG5632> mercy <WG1656>, and <WG2532> find <WG2147> <WG5632> grace <WG5485> to help <WG996> in <WG1519> time of need <WG2121>.
